name: Corrupt
description: A 2017 Thailand's phenomenal anti-corruption mobile visual novel is now available on Steam for FREE! Face the real world-inspired corruption cases and experience the consequences by yourself. Developed and produced by Opendream and Khon Thai Foundation.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 1.2Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: DirectX 9.0 supported card Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectSound-compatible sound card
